normalized: the next evening.
today, the dwellers of darkness were excited about a big event.
the arena of darkness, the demons' arena, surged with depraved cheers.
finally, the climactic battle was to take place.
in the face of this battle, the other fights to take place this night were nothing but sideshows.
the spectators had been looking forward to the battle that much.
and then, the one who appeared amid the cheers, which even drowned out the excited announcer, was asagi.
the moment asagi entered, being led by oboro, the cheering changed to booing.
the taimanin organization had crumbled due to black's machinations, its village was controlled, and voices that desired a cruel end for asagi, who was now a prisoner, flew around.

name: oboro
normalized: ready?
will you die, or will asuka, who's like your daughter, die?
what will you do?

name: asagi
normalized: kuh…?!
asagi's expression contorted due to the words of oboro, who had whispered close to her ear.

name: oboro
normalized: the outcome is decided, then♪
while ridiculing asagi like that, oboro turned her gaze towards the spectators.
the reason that the dwellers of darkness were very excited was because of a card, which said that fellow taimanin were going to kill each other in this climactic battle.
immediately after, cheers arose again.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka…
asuka appeared, being led by the ishiyama brothers.
as soon as she did, a wave of booing arose.

name: ryouji
normalized: ready?
it's been arranged so that you can just use the blades built into your arms and legs.
ryouji told asuka, amongst the storm of jeers.

name: ryouji
normalized: so you should just kill that woman.
then, we'll all be happy.

name: takuto
normalized: we'll rely on you, asuka-chan♪
our promotion is riding on it, after all.

name: asuka
normalized: …understood.
asuka nodded at the words of the detestable men.
the promise oboro made would probably be broken.
even though she knew that, there was now only one option with the possibility to keep kousuke alive, even for a little while.
to kill asagi, who was before her eyes.
it was to kill her foster mother.

name: asuka
normalized: asagi-san…
feelings of shame dominated her mind.

name: asuka
normalized: it can't be helped… right?
while emitting those words, feeling like her throat was full of sand or something, she forced herself to agree.

name: oboro
normalized: feel free to kill asagi.
she's ready as well♪
as if she sensed what was inside asuka's mind, oboro called out to her.

name: black
normalized: now, i will have you begin.
and then, from those words of black's, the horrible, worst-case revenge show began.

name: asuka
normalized: haah!

name: asagi
normalized: kuh!
the distance between them disappeared instantly, and two blades collided.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka…

name: asuka
normalized: i'm sorry, asagi-san!
asuka's eyes turned toward asagi, who could do nothing but defend.
those eyes were tinged with hopelessness.

name: asuka
normalized: please die, for kousuke's sake!

name: asagi
normalized: kuuh!
their blades crossed again.
the pair took a small distance from each other.

name: asuka
normalized: i will protect kousuke!
more to persuade herself than to tell asagi, her consciousness moved toward that alone.

name: asuka
normalized: so… please die!
pushing her responsibility for everything onto that, asuka charged for the sake of the person who was important to her.
it was at that moment.

name: asagi
normalized: aguh!
asagi, who stood off against asuka, suddenly raised a voice of anguish.
it was probably the power of the hypnotic seal oboro had told her about.
however, immediately after, the look of anguish vanished from asagi's facial expression.

name: asuka
normalized: ah…
it was an expression of having resolved herself, and accepted death.
an innocent expression, without resentment or envy or begrudgery.
asagi made that expression so as not to impose her death upon asuka.

name: asuka
normalized: uh… waa!
immediately after, asuka averted her gaze from asagi, and closed her eyes.
it couldn't be helped.
there was no other way.
if that was the case, at least, with one stroke――
what asuka felt through the blade immediately after that was the sensation of digging into her torso and tearing the flesh.
then, the blade, which had completed a “cross-section,” scattered blood as it cut through the air.
behind her, she heard a dull sound, like a heavy stone falling to the floor.
fresh blood spouted up, as if to bless the victor.
cheers rose immediately after.

name: asuka
normalized: ah… uguh…
there was no other way.
even though she was meant to have resigned herself to that, tears streamed out, and wouldn't stop.
however, no matter how much she tried to cry, tried to scream, tried to repent, it was all over.
everything was over.
and asuka could no longer move forward.
